page.title: 10Religion and The Chapel.
page.content:
The church plays an important role in the lives of some people and others who do not attend church regularly still come to church for christenings, marriages and funerals. Special services like Harvest Festival and Rememberance Sunday are very well attended. Social and fund raising events are organised for maintenance to the church. A group of bell ringers meet Thursday evenings. Sometimes exebitions are held in the church as it is the biggest building in the village. Sunday school is held each week.
{The Chapel { Services are held each week. There is {a weekly bible club for children and {young people. This also includes {social events and a yearly outing to {the sea.
